Healthy: No treatment needed. Keep monitoring and maintain good care practices.
Leaf Spot: Remove infected leaves, improve air circulation, and apply a copper-based fungicide.
Rust: Use sulfur or neem oil spray weekly. Remove infected leaves and avoid overhead watering.
Blight: Apply a copper fungicide early. Remove infected plants and avoid splashing water on leaves.
Powdery Mildew: Spray with neem oil or potassium bicarbonate. Remove affected leaves and improve air circulation.
